Sunhawk went to Beast Mode when he saw the wave
comming and barely survived the onslaught.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Warhead approached the hole that they had dug.
> 
> Warhead: Stop. That is deep enough. I can feel the
> energon!
> 
> He aimed with his laser and melted the last barrier.
> Under his eyes, 
> the energon sphere pulsated. The build-up started
> working its effect 
> on him, but he took no mention of it. What he had in
> a arm's length 
> was much more better...
> He moved his hand and tried to break a piece from
> the sphere. However, 
> what happened was not what he had planned. The
> energon began to 
> vibrate at the touch, soon making the ground shake
> and emitting a 
> strange and strident sound.
> For one of the first time in his life, Warhead was
> awed. He felt not 
> fear, because his programs did not permit him, but
> he was very 
> impressed.
> 
> Warhead: PREDACONS! OUT OF THE HOLE NOW!!!
> 
> This, however, was too late. The sphere imploded and
> sent a wave of 
> energy towards the surface, and one ray of light
> jetted in space. It 
> went in all directions in a radius of 5 kilometers.
> All transformers 
> it hit would be struck down, suddenly overwhelmed by
> the energon.
> 
> Warhead fell on the ground, in a stasis lock. The
> predacon base would 
> see that they had lost them...
> 
>
